oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Replication data for: Search Strategy for Systematic Review of Depression in Head & Neck Cancer Patients
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Slater, Linda G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Provides the search strategies used in Ovid MEDLINE, Ovid EMBASE, Ovid PsycInfo, EBSCO CINAHL, PubMed, Scopus and Web of Science Core Collection. Searches were run on August 20, 2014.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Search strategy
Systematic review
Head & Neck Cancer
